EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-22-DXC Executive Partnership Update.December 2017 Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and DXC Executive Partnership Update 12.22.2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Below please find our weekly Executive Partnership Update. In spite of some holiday slow down, we have maintained our consistent increase in velocity.
As we continue to refine the content below, we hope that you will let us know how best to refine the data and presentation. Let us know what we can do to improve.
Thanks,
Greg
